      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static long Permission.getRaw(Permission... permissions)
      This is effectively the opposite of getPermissions(long), this takes 1 or more Permissions and returns the raw offset long representation of the permissions.
      Method parameters in net.dv8tion.jda.core with type arguments of type Permission 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static long Permission.getRaw(java.util.Collection<Permission> permissions)
      This is effectively the opposite of getPermissions(long), this takes a Collection of Permissions and returns the raw offset long representation of the permissions.

      Methods in net.dv8tion.jda.core.managers.fields that return types with arguments of type Permission 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Permission> PermissionField.getOriginalPermissions()
      An immutable list of Permissions that have been calculated Field.getOriginalValue() using getPermissions(long)
      java.util.List<Permission> PermissionField.getPermissions()
      An immutable list of Permissions that are calculated from PermissionField.getValue() using getPermissions(long)
      Methods in net.dv8tion.jda.core.managers.fields with parameters of type Permission 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void PermissionField.checkPermission(Permission perm) 
      RoleManagerUpdatable PermissionField.givePermissions(Permission... permissions)
      Adds the specified permissions to the result value
      If any of the specified permissions is present in the revoked permissions it will be removed!
      This does not apply immediately - it is applied in the value returned by PermissionField.getValue()
      RoleManagerUpdatable PermissionField.revokePermissions(Permission... permissions)
      Adds the specified permissions to the result value
      These will override permissions that are given through PermissionField.givePermissions(Collection) and PermissionField.givePermissions(Permission...)!
      This does not apply immediately - it is applied in the value returned by PermissionField.getValue()
      RoleManagerUpdatable PermissionField.setPermissions(Permission... permissions)
      Sets the permissions for this PermissionField.
      Method parameters in net.dv8tion.jda.core.managers.fields with type arguments of type Permission 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RoleManagerUpdatable PermissionField.givePermissions(java.util.Collection<Permission> permissions)
      Adds the specified permissions to the result value
      If any of the specified permissions is present in the revoked permissions it will be removed!
      This does not apply immediately - it is applied in the value returned by PermissionField.getValue()
      RoleManagerUpdatable PermissionField.revokePermissions(java.util.Collection<Permission> permissions)
      Adds the specified permissions to the result value
      These will override permissions that are given through PermissionField.givePermissions(Collection) and PermissionField.givePermissions(Permission...)!
      This does not apply immediately - it is applied in the value returned by PermissionField.getValue()
      RoleManagerUpdatable PermissionField.setPermissions(java.util.Collection<Permission> permissions)
      Sets the permissions for this PermissionField.

      java.util.List<Permission> PermissionOverrideAction.getAllowedPermissions()

      Immutable list of Permissions that would be inherited from other permission holders.

      PermissionOverrideAction PermissionOverrideAction.setAllow(java.util.Collection<Permission> permissions)

      Sets the value of explicitly denied permissions using a Collection of Permissions.
      RoleAction RoleAction.setPermissions(java.util.Collection<Permission> permissions)
      Sets the Permissions the new Role should have.
      PermissionOverrideAction PermissionOverrideAction.setPermissions(java.util.Collection<Permission> grantPermissions, java.util.Collection<Permission> denyPermissions)
      Combination of PermissionOverrideAction.setAllow(java.util.Collection) and PermissionOverrideAction.setDeny(java.util.Collection)
      If a passed collection is null it resets the represented value to 0 - no permission specifics.
      PermissionOverrideAction PermissionOverrideAction.setPermissions(java.util.Collection<Permission> grantPermissions, java.util.Collection<Permission> denyPermissions)
      Combination of PermissionOverrideAction.setAllow(java.util.Collection) and PermissionOverrideAction.setDeny(java.util.Collection)
      If a passed collection is null it resets the represented value to 0 - no permission specifics.
